title: [Large-Scale] Experimental Mathematics Design Education in the Fourth Industrial Revolution Era

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Geometry and Measurement Concepts
context.additional_context: Experiential learning environment using smartphone-based VR tools, emphasizing creative problem-solving in digital-physical convergence systems.

learning_goals: Students can explain principles of volume and area calculation through 3D geometric manipulation experiments in VR simulation environments
Learners can design five or more mathematical models to solve real-life problems using digital tools
Participants can establish mathematical problem-solving strategies applying the design thinking process through small-scale collaborative projects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
